short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes all distractions on new tabs. No news, weather, photos, favorites, pins, or widgets. Nothing but blank.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you want to search or go to recent/favorite sites just type in the address bar.

Please give feedback at https://github.com/waded/new-tab-zero.
